full_description:
Corsair T3 Rush Gaming Chair Charcoal

The Corsair T3 Rush Gaming Chair is a sophisticated gaming chair from Corsair that provides you with the best relaxing feel with this durable gaming chair. The Gaming Chair body frame is made with high quality metal and the base is made with Nylon materials. This Corsair Gaming Chair can support up to 120 Kg of load and the seating fabric is made with Soft Fabric and the foam out of Polyurethane foam (cold foam). The gaming chair is equipped with 4D Armrest that can be modified and set to the best position for you. The gaming chair has a reclining angle of 90-170Â° range that provides gamers and non-gamers with the best seating angle while gaming, working or just watching movies. The Corsair Gaming Chair also has Class 4 grade Gas Lift to support you and adjust your gaming chair to the perfect height for you. The highly customizable Corsair T3 Rush Gaming Chair comes in with Gray and White color. The Corsair T3 Rush Gaming Chair has No Warranty.

With the Corsair TC100 RELAXED Leatherette Gaming Chair, you can fully immerse yourself in the ideal gaming or work experience. With its broader seat surface and racing-inspired design, this gaming chair is made for maximum comfort and style. full_description:
Corsair TC100 RELAXED Fabric Gaming Chair

The Corsair TC100 RELAXED Fabric Gaming Chair is a premium gaming and office chair designed for both pros and enthusiasts. This gaming chair is made of a variety of Plush Soft Fabric materials and defies convention by using perforated sections in its outer fabric. With this innovation, you can stay pleasantly cool during extended gaming or work sessions, all the while maintaining a welcome and fresh atmosphere. Wider seating and soft contact points provide you the flexibility to lean or recline with the ideal support, making it possible for you to sit in complete comfort for extended periods. The TC100 RELAXED was designed with your comfort in mind. A Class 4 gas lift with an enhanced height range of 100mm is included to enable adaptability and to accommodate a broad range of body heights. With the help of this feature, you can easily determine the perfect height to maintain your feet on the ground, improving your sitting experience overall and encouraging ergonomic support. With the Corsair TC100's 2D armrests, you may adjust the support your arms and wrists receive. To get the ideal placement for your particular comfort needs, move the armrests inside or outward or up or down. This meticulous attention to detail demonstrates the chair's dedication to offering a customized and unique sitting experience. The TC100 has a steep recline function that lets you tilt back at an amazing range of 90-160° for those times when relaxing is of the utmost importance. Whether you're playing video games for extended periods or just need a moment to relax, this gaming chair allows you to recline and feel comfortable from any position, making the most of your downtime. The Corsair TC100 RELAXED Fabric Gaming Chair is evidence of the company's dedication to comfort, ergonomic design, and adaptability. With its clever features and cutting-edge design, this chair will elevate your workstation or gaming setup and offer an unmatched seated experience.
